remarks: Equivalent condition for a full functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
statement:
isfull.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isfull.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` D ) $.
isfull.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
isfull2 $p |- ( F ( C Full D ) G <-> ( F ( C Func D ) G /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B ( x G y ) : ( x H y ) -onto-> ( ( F ` x ) J ( F ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
